page.title: 05Farming 1
page.content: There are two pig farms in East Halton and five farms with cattle. Most of the cattle are bullocks kept for fattening. There is one farm which keeps cows for milk. The milking is done by electric milkers. The breed kept for milking is Friesian. A few people keep goats and chickens. Most of the farmers have their own cereal harvesters. The most popular make is Massey Ferguson. I live on a pig farm. My dad works as a quantity surveyor and my mum runs the farm.I help a lot at harvest time. We have two Massey Ferguson tractors on my farm. We use them for
